Dubai.description: Dubai is home to the world's tallest building, the most gargantuan mall and the largest indoor ski slope.

Turkey.description: Turkey is one of our most popular holiday destinations during the summer months, with its beautiful beaches.

Thailand.description: Thailand will impress you at every turn. And then there’s the food.From its enchanting rainforests, rambling mountains

Bangkok.description: Bangkok, city, capital, and chief port of Thailand. It is the only cosmopolitan city in a country of small towns and villages.

Phuket.description: Phuket province is located in southern Thailand. It is the biggest Island of Thailand and sits on the Andaman sea.

Pattaya.description: Pattaya is a city on Thailand’s eastern Gulf coast known for its beaches A quiet fishing village as recently as the 1960s.

Baku.description: Baku, city, capital of Azerbaijan. It lies on the western shore of the Caspian Sea and the southern side of the Abşeron Peninsula.

Malaysia.description: Travel around to experience the remarkable treasures and the hidden gems in Malaysia. Each state offers a unique Malaysian experience for all.

Kuala Lumpur.description: A skyline punctuated by minarets, Mogul-style domes and skyscrapers; colorful, food-stall-lined streets shaded by a leafy canopy of banyan trees.

Maldives.description: With 26 atolls and 1,000+ islands spread out across the idyllic waters of the Indian Ocean, the Maldives are an island-hopper’s dream.

Singapore.description: Singapore is the largest port in Southeast Asia and one of the busiest in the world.It consists of the diamond-shaped Singapore Island

Sri Lanka.description: Turkey is one of our most popular holiday destinations during the summer months, with its beautiful beaches..
